purpleculture_pinyin:
zhà
to press; to extract (juice); device for extracting juice, oils etc; variant of 榨 ; to press; to extract (juice)
нажать; извлекать (сок); устройство для отжима сока, масел и т. д .; вариант 榨; нажать; извлекать (сок)
rtega_mnemonic:
榨榨RS
搾搾		扠crush with the hand, press, squeeze, extract
  • hand 扌 squeezing an orange with a wooden 木 device, the juice exists through a narrow 窄 opening
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 搾, 榨)
Pictophonetic: 窄 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
榨菜 [ zhà cài ]: hot pickled mustard tuber
压榨 [ yā zhà ]: to press; to squeeze; to extract juice, oil etc by squeezing
榨取 [ zhà qǔ ]: to extract; to squeeze out (juice etc); (fig.) to exploit
榨油 [ zhà yóu ]: to extract oil from vegetables; to press
榨汁机 [ zhà zhī jī ]: juicer; blender
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 窄 [ zhǎi ] narrow, tight; narrow-minded
heisig_chinese_memo: If you want to extract the medicine from a tree you don't need to saw it in half.  Just make a strait hole and extract with a syringe.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you want to extract the medicine from a tree you don't need to saw it in half.  Just make a strait hole and extract with a syringe.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " narrow " sound. " Virgin " means an object squeeze juice appliances. For example, the fifth of the Northern Song Dynasty Mu Xiu's "Having a Secluded Residence in the Jiangshu": "The new wine is squeezed, and the fish spins off the hook."

" Squeeze " as a verb means squeeze. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Zhou Bangyan's "Biandu Fu": "Kun Ling stomped due to the squeeze, and the soil monster was afraid of squeezing it." The fourth episode of "Water Margin": "The broken urn was squeezed into yellow rice wine, and Chaimen picked out the cloth. Curtain."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " narrow " sound. " Virgin " means an object squeeze juice appliance, said squeeze.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「窄」聲。「榨」表示擠壓物體汁液的器具。如北宋穆修〈和秀才江墅幽居好〉之五：「酒醲新出榨，魚活旋離鈎。」

　　「榨」作動詞表示擠壓。如北宋周邦彥〈汴都賦〉：「坤靈因贔屓而跼蹐，土怪畏榨壓而妥貼。」《水滸全傳》第4回：「破瓮榨成黃米酒，柴門挑出布青簾。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「窄」聲。「榨」表示擠壓物體汁液的器具，也表示擠壓。

For example, the fifth of the Northern Song Dynasty Mu Xiu's "Having a Secluded Residence in the Jiangshu": "The new wine is squeezed, and the fish spins off the hook." " Squeeze" as a verb means squeeze. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Zhou Bangyan's "Biandu Fu": "Kun Ling stomped due to the squeeze, and the soil monster was afraid of squeezing it." The fourth episode of "Water Margin": "The broken urn was squeezed into yellow rice wine, and Chaimen picked out the cloth. Curtain."

榨字的基本解释

榨
zhà
压出物体里汁液的器具：油榨。酒榨。榨床。
〔榨菜〕ａ．二年生草本植物，芥菜的变种，茎膨大成瘤状，可食；ｂ．用这种植物的茎加辣椒、香料等腌制而成的副食品。
用力把物体里的汁液压出来，引申为逼取他人的财物：榨油。榨取。压榨。

榨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhà］
［《廣韻》側駕切，去禡，莊。］
亦作“搾1”。亦作“醡1”。
(1)挤压出物体内汁液的器具。
(2)把物体里的汁液压挤出来。
(3)逼迫。
(4)方言。栽种。

榨字的英文翻译

◎ 榨
pressing, squeeze, wring

榨字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榨； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第03
【唐韻】側嫁切，音詐。打油具也。出《證俗文》。　又【類篇】酒盝。　又【集韻】側賣切，音債。義同。

榨字的源字形

榨字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
zhà
Apparatus for pressing out the juice in the object: oil squeezer. Wine press. Press bed.
[Mustard mustard] a. A biennial herbaceous plant, a variety of mustard, with swelling and tumor-like stems, edible; b. It is a non-staple food made by pickling the stems of this plant with peppers and spices.
Force the juice out of the object, which is extended to force others' property: squeeze oil. Squeeze. press.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhà］
["Guangyun" drives sideways and cuts to Qi, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "squeezing 1". Also known as "醡1".
(1) An appliance that squeezes out the juice from the object.
(2) Squeeze out the juice from the object hydraulically.
(3) Persecution.
(4) Dialects. plant.
Squeeze
English translation of words
◎ Squeeze
pressing, squeeze, wring
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　 squeezing; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 544 03
[Tang Yun] Side marriage cut, sound fraud. Oilers are also. Out of "Proof of Common Literature."　[Classes] Wine 盝.　[Jiyun] Side-selling cut, sound debt. The same meaning.
Squeeze
Source glyph
Squeeze
Name meaning
Nothing.
会意字。从木,表示木制的榨取物体液汁的器具;从窄,窄有窄小义,将某些物挤压得窄小,汁液就会从物体中流出来;
窄(zhi)兼表声。本义是压出物体里汁液的器具。
①压出物体里汁液的器具:油~「酒~。2用力压出物体
里的汁液:~油|~甘蔗。
~菜 ~床 ~取 ~糖 ~油糖~ 压~ 油~
榨
zhà
榨|
榨。
………プ
Зная слово.
Из дерева это означает деревянное устройство для выдавливания сока предметов; от узкого к узкому есть узкое значение. Когда определенные предметы сжимаются в узкие, сок вытечет из объекта; узкий (чжи) также выражает звук.
Первоначальное значение - это устройство для выдавливания сока в объекте.
① Аппарат для выдавливания сока в объекте: масло ~ "Вино ~". 2 Сильно выдавите сок в объекте: ~ масло | ~ сахарный тростник.
~ растительное ~ грядка ~ возьмите ~ сахар ~ масло сахар ~ пресс ~ масло ~
Сжимать
Сожмите |
Сжимать.
……… プ
zhà
1) выжимать; выдавливать
榨甘蔗 давить сахарный тростник
榨酒 выжимать винное сусло
榨汁 выжимать сок
2) пресс, жом (для выжимания масла, сока, винного сусла)
上榨 идти под пресс
